ValidationRule.description: Requires user to update to Canada if they enter CA or CAN
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( ISCHANGED( LastActivityDate )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Activity_Type__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Date_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Subject_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Type_Account__c ) )) && OR(ShippingCountry = "CA", ShippingCountry="CAN")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter Canada as the country name.
